name: Just Die (H4MzaSheib4)
description:
A/D = Moving

W = jump

R = Restart Level

Hi, the game Idea steal from @Vimlark, I tried to make it better but I made it worse than it should be .

HOW MY GAME FIT THE THEME: You need to die to reach the finish = DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

1- drop down and die, you will change to a block

2- respawn and jump into your block

3- reach the finish

Link : https://vimlark.itch.io/reaper-repeat 

I use some of assets so you can get my project
